caption.p: Complete cascade including all steps. A) HIV care cascade as defined by the WHO, B) Assessment of ART eligibility within the HIV care cascade. ART, antiretroviral therapy; D, denominator; LTP*, loss to programme (pre-ART); LTP**, loss to programme (post-ART); N, nominator; PLD, population level denominator; PBD, programme-based denominator.
